title: C++ is one of the world
content:
C++ is one of the world's most popular programming languages.
 	 C++ can be found in today's operating systems, Graphical User Interfaces, and embedded systems. C++ is an object-oriented programming language which gives a clear structure to programs and allows code to be reused, lowering development costs. C++ is a general-purpose programming language created by Danish computer scientist Bjarne Stroustrup as an extension of the C programming language
